blogPost.excerpt: SVGX is a FREE offline desktop SVG icon/asset manager and browser for Mac and Windows. Use it to quickly locate the perfect icon for your design, copy and edit the SVG code, generate repeating background CSS, and more.
blogPost.body: SVGX is a FREE offline desktop SVG icon/asset manager and browser for Mac and Windows. Use it to quickly locate the perfect icon for your design, copy and edit the SVG code, generate repeating background CSS, and more.
blogPost.title: SVGX - Desktop SVG asset manager for designers and developers
blogPost.author: Constantin

localize.description: SVGX是一款免费的离线桌面SVG图标/资产管理器和Mac和Windows的浏览器。使用它可以快速为您的设计找到完美的图标，复制和编辑SVG代码，生成重复的背景CSS等。
localize.tagline: 设计师和开发人员的桌面SVG资产管理器

localize.description: SVGX是一款免費的離線桌面SVG圖標/資產管理器和Mac和Windows的瀏覽器。使用它可以快速爲您的設計找到完美的圖標，複製和編輯SVG代碼，生成重複的背景CSS等。
localize.tagline: 設計師和開發人員的桌面SVG資產管理器
